pr_title: Only print out errors to stderr when not using TEXT output

timeline.message:
Only print out errors to stderr when not using TEXT outout
JSON and SARIF format  includes errors in the output so printing to
stderr is redundant.
fixup! Only print out errors to stderr when not using TEXT outout JSON and SARIF format  includes errors in the output so printing to stderr is redundant.

timeline.bodyText:
If we were fancy this would be a method on OutputFormat, so we don't have to remember to update this as we monkey with OutputFormat objects.
But this works too :)
timeline.author: nbrahms
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -242,7 +242,10 @@ def handle_semgrep_error(self, error: SemgrepError) -> None:
         if error not in self.error_set:
             self.semgrep_structured_errors.append(error)
             self.error_set.add(error)
-            logger.error(str(error))
+            if self.settings.output_format == OutputFormat.TEXT:
